    • Method Detail

      • addChartPanel

        public void addChartPanel​(JComponent chartPanel,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          String descX,
                          String descY)
        Parameters:
        chartPanel - The chart panel (probably a scatter plot)
        x - The position in the scatter block - X
        y - The position in the scatter block - Y
        descX - The description of the X axis.
        descY - The description of the Y axis.

      • getChartPanel

        public JComponent getChartPanel​()
        Returns the scatter block as a component. This method can only be called once, as components are not allowed to be used twice in Java GUI programming (IMHO).
        Returns:
        The scatter block with the charts that where added with addChartPanel.

        public static Color getBackCol​()
